bibl.title: Two Bath Buildings on the Western Side of the Sphinx' Avenue in Luxor.
bibl.note: Discusses the remains of two bath buildings dating from the Roman period. - 1. General description of the area. - 2. The 'small bath'. - 3. The 'large bath'. - 4. Typological observations on private bath buildings.

bibl.title: Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie Copte

bibl.seg: Jacek Kościuk, Two Bath Buildings on the Western Side of the Sphinx' Avenue in Luxor.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 50 (2011) pp. 75-100, 3 figg., 9 pll.

Discusses the remains of two bath buildings dating from the Roman period. - 1. General description of the area. - 2. The 'small bath'. - 3. The 'large bath'. - 4. Typological observations on private bath buildings.
